name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NITL: Take action on the news

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take action on things that you care about.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take action on the news you read.

Act by contributing to a cause, sending messages to member of parliaments, signing petitions.. and a lot more!

NITL is the smarter way to read news stories from around the world.
How it works

Itâ€™s simple: Click on the Chrome plugin while reading your daily news. Boom - You can now make an impact on things that matter to you.
